name: Plumbers 2077
description:
Plumbers 2077 is a game about city plumber's job in 2077, where people started using drones to unclog the pipes! You are an operator of the first prototype. Good luck!

CONTROLS:

[R] - Restart

[ArrowUp] - Up Thrust

[ArrowDown] - Down Thrust

[ArrowLeft] - Roll Left

[ArrowRight] - RollRight

If anyone ever wants to know the rats' names - Capoeira, Capoeira (1), Capoeira BIG
